Today only, as part of its Holiday Deals of the Day offers, Best Buy is offering ASUS’ 2025 CX14 Chromebook for $249 shipped. This is a fairly new model that hit the scene earlier this year alongside other ASUS Chromebooks carrying a $429 price tag. That means you’re looking at a straight-up $180 discount on it today, which works out to about 42% discount. It’s a pretty good option to consider if you’re in the market to buy a new, everyday laptop without burning a huge hole in your wallet, and it’s available at a particularly good price today as part of the retailer’s daily deals offer. Head below for more details.

items.summary:
The official Our Place Amazon storefront is offering its Dream Cooker 6-quart Multicooker at $159 shipped in four colorways, after clipping the on-page $10 off coupon. Normally fetching $199 at full price, we’ve seen discounts over the year taking this appliance as low as $165 regularly, with some occasional drops further to $159, like we’re seeing here. You’ll be getting a $40 markdown while this deal lasts, letting you update your kitchen gear with a stylish and multi-purpose cooker at the best price we have tracked. You can also find a number of the brand’s other toxin-free appliances and cooking equipment with up to 30% savings here.

items.title: Manual mowing is so 2025, skip it next year with ECOVACS’ Goat A3000 LiDAR robot down at $2,100 (Save $900)
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the ECOVACS Goat A3000 LiDAR Robot Lawn Mower at $2,099.99 shipped, which is coming down from its full $3,000 price tag, which is where it’s still priced at directly from the brand’s website. This model doesn’t receive as frequent discounts as its Goat O1000 and A2500 models, though we have seen it dropping between $2,600 and $2,500 most of the year, with more recent falls as low as $2,100 and a one-time Prime Day low of $2,085. You’re looking at the second-best price here while the savings stick around, giving you the most advanced robot mower from the brand’s lineup with $900 savings. You can also save more by going with the base Goat O1000 robot that is down at new $699 low right now for Christmas – with both models arriving before the upcoming holiday.

items.title: Jackery Xmas flash sale up to $1,700 off power stations: First deal on Explorer 300D 40W solar bundle at $249, more
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Christmas Holiday Sale, Jackery has launched a 72-hour flash sale with up to $1,700 savings across four particular units, dropping most of them to new and returning low prices, while also offering the first-ever deal on the latest Explorer 300D Portable Power Station with a 40W Air solar panel for $249 shipped. You can also find the standalone station for $169 shipped. The station recently snuck onto the scene with little media attention and normally goes for $219 at full price, while the flash-featured bundle goes for $359. This is the very first savings that we have noticed on this compact unit, which is nowhere to be found on Amazon. All-in-all, you’re getting a $50 markdown on the station and $110 off the bundle, which sets the bar for future discounts down the road. Head below to check out all the other 72-hour low prices while they’re still around!
